title: Ninjas in Pyjamas
description: Ninjas in Pyjamas is a premier esports organization known for their iconic brand colors: a vibrant lime green (#D8FF00), steel grey (#97999B), pure white (#FFFFFF), and deep black (#000000). These colors symbolize their dynamic and competitive spirit in the gaming world, as represented on their official website at http://nip.gl/ and further confirmed through their brand guidelines on https://nip.gl/pages/brand.
